string.text: Halt stalker, you can't go any further!
Why not?
Because that's 'Duty' territory, and we're very picky about who we let into the base. If you don't have anything important to discuss with our leaders you ain't getting past.
I see.
Those are the rules.
I need to pass. I have some business with the Barkeep.
Ok, Barkeep told us about you. You can pass.
I'd rather pay. Here!
Good! You can go, but you better have some really important business with the Barkeep, you hear? And be careful there's lots of anomalies ahead.
What's the favor?
Nothing much. There is a herd of boars wandering nearby that needs to be killed. Take them out and consider your passage paid for.
Deal.
Good luck stalker.
I don't have the money.
Well then you better start looking for it!
I don't have the money.
Well, you can't go through to the bar then.
Thanks for helping us fighting off the boars, take this well deserved reward.
Thanks!
So have you killed those boars yet?
Not yet.
Shame. When you start cutting them up for chops, bring me one would you?
Yeah I killed them all.
Ok, you can pass. And say hi to the Barkeep for me, will you?
Say hi for the Barkeep from me when you see him. Oh and don't forget there are lots of anomalies on the way so be careful.
Thanks man you really helped me out. I won't forget it.
What's going on here?
Ok.

We're trying to clear Garbage of bandits. My friends are going to ambush a bandit squad nearby. If we don't stop them they'll take control of Garbage and nobody will be able to go deeper into the Zone. Talk to our commander. He and his men are near here, at the machinery scrapyard. I'm going there myself. We can go together if you want.
Let's go.
Can you tell me anything about Garbage?

There ain't much to tell man. Garbage is, ah, well, a dump. Duty fighters guard the northern road to the Bar. You might want to avoid them. 'Duty' is full of real nasty types. To the right are the paths into Dark Valley. Note that the radiation levels are very high there. A little closer is the Grimpen Mire. Terrible marshes full of anomalies. They say it's easy to find some decent artifacts there but even easier to find a lot of trouble. Oh well, at least there ain't no Hound of the Baskervilles in the Mire!
Go on.

To the right by the marshes there's a secret hiding place. You'll see a metallic construction overhanging a puddle. My stash is right below it. I put it there a while ago but you saved my life and you probably need it more than I do anyway. So feel free to use it.
Thanks man that's useful info.
That's interesting, thanks.

Hey stalker you're just in time! We could really use your help. Those bandit bastards are trying to take control of the Garbage. We had a shootout here half an hour ago and managed to take down three of the dogs. The others retreated but I'm dead certain they are going to come back with reinforcements any minute now. There aren't too many of us left and another man wouldn't hurt.
And ...
We've set up an ambush for them here. They'll be coming from the West, from the Agroprom Research Institute. Help us destroy their reinforcements and you won't regret it!
Ok I'll help you.
Great.
It's none of my business and I don't want to get involved.
As you wish. You'll be cursing your stupidity every time you pay those boneheads for passage into the Zone.
I've killed them all.
You're the man! But I'll play it safe just in case.
We have nothing to talk about.
Thanks man, you really helped us out there. Will you accept some cash? A small token of our gratitude.
Sure.
Here this should pay for the medical treatment to recover your health.
Thank you.
Tell me about yourself.

Bes is my name. I came to these parts three years ago. Like many of the guys in the Zone I'm a fugitive, wanted for two murders and GBH. A few years ago a friend of mine got battered pretty bad, they had to literally stitch him back together at the hospital. So I paid the bastards who did it a little visit. When the choppers showed up I had to shoot one of them down and jump out of a third-floor window. I've been here since. I've done well in this place but the list of my crimes has got a little longer too. I try to fight the lawless just as I did on the outside. I train rookies and teach them to survive in the Zone.
So why don't you join Duty if you feel that way?
Duty fights against the Zone. I fight for the people. Besides they're too closely linked with the government and the army. I don't want to wake up in a cold cell one day.
Good luck to you.
What's this place?

Garbage. We are right at home here. You see the heaps of crap? You don't want to go there, trust me. So full of radioactive waste, the Geiger counters go off the scale. This is the only decent way into the Zone and bandits have been increasingly active here lately. They're shit scared of going deeper into the Zone, into Duty territory, like experienced stalkers. But those hyenas just love robbing the rookies here. So, if nobody else cares, we have to stand our ground and fight ourselves.
Go on.
Everywhere, and especially here, you gotta act like a human being, not like some greed-driven animal. That's my outlook on life.
Are there any large buildings in the Garbage?
Thank you.
Thanks I don't need anything from you.
I know quite a lot. I could share some information with you.
The job ain't done. Let's finish it and talk later.
Hey Strelok.
Dammit it man this ain't no time for talking! In a few seconds the only things talking will be guns. Help me fight them off and we can talk after.
Thanks for the help. Things got pretty hairy. What are you doing here anyway?
I am looking for information about Strelok. Fox told me about you, so I came for a chat.

Okay you helped me out for free so I'll tell you. One of the guys, a former 'Digger' called Mole is waiting for me. He dug up Strelok's stash but I don't know if he found anything there. Here are the coordinates of our meeting place. Tell him I sent you. They'll be looking for me now so I am going to disappear for a while. Here's some cash for your help too.
Thanks for the information.
I am looking for information about Strelok, maybe you know something?

Ok you helped me out for free so I'll tell you. One of the guys, a former 'Digger' called Mole is waiting for me. He dug up Strelok's stash and found documents that explain a few things. He had some bandits on his tail so he had to leave the documents but he remembered the place. They'll be looking for me now so I am gonna disappear for a while. Here are the coordinates of the meeting place with Mole. Tell him I sent you. I'll upload some info to your PDA. Here's some cash for your help too.
Thanks for the info.
Hey man! Things got pretty hairy here a minute ago, I have to say. What are you doing here anyway?
A safe path, stalker. A safe path past the anomalies and straight to the artifacts.
What can one find in Garbage?

You can find a lot of trouble real quick, that's for sure. But since you're such an explorer I'll tell you what I know. To the East there is a little forest. Nothing interesting there and it's full of dogs, so be careful. This railway track will lead you to a tunnel. There are lots of anomalies there, maybe something else too, but I don't know, never really looked very hard. You probably know about the Duty checkpoint in the North. That's basically all I know about this place.
Thanks for the information.
Listen man what can I find at this Garbage?

You can find a lot of trouble real quick, that's for sure. But since you're such an explorer I'll tell you what I know. To the East there is a little forest. Nothing interesting there and it's full of dogs, so be careful. This railway track will lead you to a tunnel. There are lots of anomalies there, maybe something else too but I don't know, never really looked very hard. You probably know about the Duty checkpoint in the North. That's basically all I know about this place.
Thanks for the info. I'll keep it in mind.
Can you tell me anything about this place?

Well listen. Everywhere you look it's a big stinking dump. After the accident in 1986 they brought radioactive waste, cranes and all the destroyed machinery here. Basically, it's full of useless crap and a few anomalies here and there. You can even find some artifacts, but they're not spectacular so that's why you'll mostly find rookies in this place. Lots of rookies means lots of bandits, so it's best not to hang around too long. Further to the East there are loads of radiation pockets; you can't go there without protection. Going South you'll reach the border of the Zone. Go North and you'll eventually reach Rostok factory and the stalker bar. To the East is the Dark Valley, a gloomy, misty place. To the West is the Agroprom Research Institute. I'll mark safe pathways on your map.

In the center there's a large hangar, usually it's pretty quiet there. Worst comes to worst, you can spend the night there. If you go west, in the direction of the Agroprom, there's a bandit camp there, and that's where those freaks that we killed off a while ago were coming from. But I have a feeling that there's more of them there.
Do you know anything interesting?

I found a rare artifact yesterday, listen, how it was. I was walking around the Military warehouses, through a village. Throwing the bolts as usual, looking at the detector and smoking a cigarette. Suddenly I saw that a bolt that I threw a moment ago does not fall to the ground, just hanging in the air. I was literally shocked. I'm in the Zone for about a year now and I've never seen such a thing! I suppose I was so shocked my brain even stopped working, 'cause I've put my hand into that thing...
How did you feel?
It felt as though I've put my hand into some sticky mucus... And I couldn't even pull my hand out! So there I was standing with my hand pulled out, as though I was some sort of beggar.
How did you manage to get out?

That's what the whole story is about! I've noticed a really weird thing about 30 cantimetres away from my hand. It was spiral with blue droplets on it. And it was shining as well... As though emitting something... So I've started to try and reach that thing really hard... I kept pulling my hand towards it probably for about half an hour.
The bloodsuckers were probably looking at you as at some kind of a show.
Maybe. And a controller was selling the tickets.
So what happened next?
Nothing much. As soon as I've grabbed that thing everything stopped. No mucus. But now I have my own portable matrix.
Yeah, that's right. And what shall the artifact be called?
I've already found out some info on it. Barman has told me. He didn't know anything about the anomaly, but the artifact is called 'Glass Beads'.
Cool.
Anything new around here?
Nothing much, really. Hey Strelok have you met the new Spetsnaz soldiers yet?
No, have you?

Yep! Recently I had a very romantic and surprising story. So I went for the expedition to the sector near the dungeons. Scientists have asked for a pseudodog's head. Well I've reached the dungeons, hiding near the cars, watching the surroundings with binoculars. Then suddenly I heard a growl right behind me. My hair stood up, my heart sank. I turned round and saw a massive Pseudodog looking straight at me! I suppose it killed many of our guys. I thought it was my turn then. My whole life played through my head, you know, and then, BANG! Its skull cracks, its freaking brain goes everywhere. I was so shocked, just standing there, blinking. Who was my saviour? I saw someone walking out from behind a rubbish container. It was a soldier! With some freaking good armour! Exoskeleton, holding a Dragunov. So he comes up to me and asks 'Who are you?' with computer voice. Well, I was nervous, so I told him everything quickly, 'that scientists have sent me on a mission and I have to find a dead pseudodog'. The next moment he takes off his helmet and I see that it's actually a woman! And she was quite pretty as well!
*Laughs* You should've gotten her phone number.
It's quite boring around here.

Boring you say?! Then listen to this, I had a very strange thing happening to me. Once I was walking through an abandoned village. I've been there many times before... Maybe, you have as well, nearly everyone walks through there. It was becoming dark. Suddenly I saw light coming out of the windows of one of the houses. I was curious about what was there, and the house didn't look abandoned at all. I looked thorugh a window and couldn't see anything, but still it was strange. So, I've decided to walk inside. And as soon as I walked in I was shocked. Everything was so neat and clean. New furniture everywhere, flowers on the windowsill, even a carpet on the floor. That was really weird, I even started wondering whether its old owners had returned, you know, that happens sometimes. I walk into another room and see a table with plates of food on top of it, a decanter with something clear in it. So, I thought that people must be somewhere nearby. I've waited for some time. But I was really hungry, and the soup smelt so good!
At least tell me a somewhat believable tale.

I hadn't smelt anything so tasty in years! I thought to myself, why is there food here if no ones gonna eat it? I wanted to eat it, so I thought, maybe the people who live in there wouldn't be very offended If I take a bit. And, just in case, I could always pay them as well. I sat in an armchair, it was very soft and comfortable, put my shotgun nearby and started to eat. The food was really nice and vodka in the decanter was good as well, not like that rubbish they sell here. I remember that I fell asleep. When I woke up it was morning already. I looked around and... Shit! I found myself sitting in the middle of a dirty hovel on a wooden box. I grabbed my rucksack - the loot and my gun was in place. I was really shocked, I was wondering how I got there. I walked outside and looked around me. The house looked similar but it was all old and rickety, just as all the other houses in that village. I was just standing there puzzled wondering whether I've smoked anything funny the day before. Then after some time I've continued my journey. What do you think and why do things like that happen?
I think you were a bit too keen on the vodka that day.
What are you talking about? Im a light drinker, and I've never done any drugs or anything. I'm a really healthy person. But how did that happen?
Im not sure bro. I think the Zone puts too much strain on our heads. I still have really wierd dreams about the Chernobyl Power Plant, as though I've been there.
Have you heard of the 'Wish Granter'?
Of course! Has the Barman told you those tales? I've even nearly found it once.
No way!

Let a bloodsucker take me if I'm lying! Honestly! Listen, it all started here in Garbage. I was hiding from Piotr. You know that wanker is impossible to work with. I get sick of his babbling, "That's mine, I spotted it first!", then starts shooting in all directions. So. While I was hiding I took a swig of a little too much vodka, you know, I had to protect myself from radiation and then I took a wrong path, ended up in a swamp. I would've sank, but Rad Hoosher saved me and on the way back he told me that Butcher has found the Wish Granter. And that he knows the way to that place, he offered me to go with him, because alone he wouldn't have managed it. And that Stalker, 'Fool' forgot to ask of the path and some mutants attacked us just before the post. I went for the post, cause' all my stuff sank in the swamp, but Rat retreated to the swamp. I haven't seen him since and he didn't have time to tell me the path to the Wish Granter, what a pity. So, that's the story.
Bullshit, thats a lie if I've ever heard one.
Fuck you!
